mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, uno) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{uno})
mapper.select: select board.bno, board.title, board.content, user.id as writer, board.regDate, board.viewCnt from board join user on board.uno = user.uno where board.bno = #{bno} order by board.bno desc, board.regDate desc
mapper.update: update board set viewCnt = viewCnt + 1 where board.bno = #{bno}
update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, modDate=now() where bno = #{bno}
